unnormalised: HDFC Bank recently announced a special offer on personal loans, slashing interest rates to as low as 8.25% p.a. This move, effective from 15/11/2024, is aimed at boosting festive spending.

unnormalised: SBI, not to be left behind, is also offering pre-approved loans via their YONO app. Customers with good credit scores can avail loans up to ₹5 lakh with minimal documentation. They're even running a 'Diwali Dhamaka' offer till 30th Nov, giving a 0.25% discount on processing fees.

unnormalised: But it's not just the big boys getting in on the action. Fintech startups like Bajaj Finserv are pushing the envelope with instant digital loans. unnormalised: Meanwhile, RBI is keeping a close watch on the burgeoning unsecured loan market.
